violations.description: Exceeded the maximum occupancy limit of 1000 people in a single zone.
violations.recommendation: Reduce the number of people or move them to another zone.

violations.description: Persons with badges other than green, light blue, dark blue, purple, orange are not allowed nearby.
violations.recommendation: Ensure that only authorized personnel have access to the area.

violations.description: Attended bags, weapons, or unknown packages were observed.
violations.recommendation: Report the suspicious objects to security personnel.

violations.description: Fighting, running, or aggressive gestures were observed.
violations.recommendation: Stop the behavior and report it to security personnel.

violations.description: Not all persons in work zones are wearing required PPE.
violations.recommendation: Ensure that all personnel wear required PPE.

compliant_rules.notes: No compliant rules were found in the observation data.

report.summary: The scene observation is non-compliant due to exceeding the maximum occupancy limit and unauthorized personnel being present. This poses a high risk of security breaches or accidents as a result of overcrowding and lack of proper supervision.
